description: This is everything I install, or update on any new machine or fresh install, usually work machines. I'm new at this and the first couple of releases weren't tested and had issues. I was too excited and rushed them out. I think I got it's all ok for now, unless I forgot something.
displayName: Matt's Tools and Updates for a Fresh OS install
summary: Matt's Software and Tools for a fresh install.
author: Matt Blocker
